title: How to Make a Caesar Salad With Grilled Chicken

steps.headline: Season the chicken breast and grill under a medium heat for 5 minutes per side.
Whisk the cheese meanwhile, mustard Worcestershire sauce, garlic and stock together.
Place the lettuce leaves and tomatoes into a bowl, toss in dressing.
Serve the salad on a plate with sliced chicken.

text: Season the chicken breast and grill under a medium heat for 5 minutes per side.  Whisk the cheese meanwhile, mustard Worcestershire sauce, garlic and stock together.  Place the lettuce leaves and tomatoes into a bowl, toss in dressing.  Serve the salad on a plate with sliced chicken.
